Text:
It's very risky to use German stuff from Microsoft. They give pings direct to Microsoft in order to take you to court.

No wonder that this torrent is By:
    Anonymous

Don't listen to this shithead, everything works fine here, goddamnit...
Uploader is trusted (notice the pink skull after his name), plus this torrent has 51 seeders.
Thanks for the torrent!
Excellent download Everything works as it should!

Hi there. I need help, i'm not a computer-hero...:-)
so:
I have a mac, I downloaded this application (every thing went very well, it took 15min to download), droped it into my USB-Stick and gave it to a friend who works with Windows XP Professional Version 2002 Service Pack 3.
When he tries to open the .iso file, windows doesn't know with what to open this file...
What do we have to do please?
Thank you very much...

.iso means it's an image of a cd - a format unlike the normal ones. u can either burn iso files on a cd (using "nero"), or use an emulator which acts like a (virtual) cd drive.
I use poweriso, using this progi you can "mount" the file and play it.

thanks to the uploader.  ;o)
Danke für's Teilen  :o)

Einfache installation. Funktioniert super auch unter Vista. Läuft am flüssigsten unter XP. Hier habe ich viele (sehr nützliche!) Optionen entdeckt, die ich vorher nicht kannte. 

@kraid07: no matter htortilla is really a shithead, where did you see a skull or a name of the uploader? I see only 'Anonnymous'.

@paquito1984:
Mount it with 'DiskImageMounter.app'(right-click/open with//rechts-Klick/öffnen mit) and burn it in the Finder on your Mac(yellow-black radiation-sign-button//gelb-schwarzer Strahlenwarnung-Button). 

Happy new year all together  :o)

The Uploader had a skull-icon once before, now it's missing... :(
This one is safe though.

Ja schick. Läuft. Bisher alles Bestens.

Wenn es nicht so verflucht weit verbreitet wäre, könnte man alles mit OpenOffice machen. 

Aber z.B läßt sich das neue PowerPoint-Fprmat (*.pptx) mit OpenOffice Impress einfach noch nicht importieren. MS muß halt immer den anderen Stöcker zwischen die Beine werfen.
Bis das klappt, kauf ich doch nicht das ganze Paket, nur um EINE *.pptx-Datei zu öffnen, um sie dann als *.ppt abzuspeichern damit sie  für OO importierbar wird.

Na ja, seis drum, ist halt so. Finde ja Diebstahl nicht gerade prickelnd. Ausgenutze Monopolo-Stellungen wie von MS sind aber ebenso unakzeptabel.

Don't believe htortilla. The users who upload this was trusted before but now the account is deleted and the name become Anonymous. I tested this and everything is working fine. My friend get about 1.2 MB/s of 1.6 MB/s download.

Mein Freund bekommt 1.2 MB/s download von 1.6 MB/s wenn er diesen Torrent l?dt.
